com.leantegra.powermote.sdk.device.connection

Class PowerMoteConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leantegra.powermote.sdk.device.connection.PowerMoteConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDeviceConnection

    public class PowerMoteConnection
extends Object
implements BaseDeviceConnection
    Allows to establish connection with PowerMote device. Used for reading and writing device GATT characteristics.

    All read and write operations are added in the queue, so no need to wait for finishing the previous operation.

    Note: Application should call disconnect() as early as possible after executing job with the device.

    Usage: 
      PowerMoteConnection connection;
  ...
  connection=new PowerMoteConnection(context, "AA:AA:AA:AA:AA:AA", new PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteConnectionListener() {

     @Override
      public void onConnect() {
          //Interact with beacon
          //Read advertising interval
          connection.readAdvertisingInterval(new PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteReadListener() {

             @Override
              public void onSuccess(PowerMoteCharacteristic powerMoteCharacteristic) {
                  if (powerMoteCharacteristic.getType() == PowerMoteCharacteristicType.ADVERTISING_INTERVAL) {
                      int interval = powerMoteCharacteristic.getIntValue();
                  }
              }

             @Override
              public void onError(PowerMoteError powerMoteError, PowerMoteCharacteristicType powerMoteCharacteristicType) {
                   //Handle error
              }
          });
      }

     @Override
      public void onDisconnect() {
          ...
      }

     @Override
      public void onError(PowerMoteError powerMoteError) {
          //Handle error
      }
  });
  connection.connect();
    See Also:
    BaseDeviceConnection

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PowerMoteConnection.DeviceInfoReadListener
      DeviceInfoReadListener provides callbacks indicating whether PowerMote info has been read successfully or failed.
      static interface  PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteConnectionListener
      PowerMoteConnectionListener provides callbacks indicating whether connection state changed.
      static interface  PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteReadListener
      PowerMoteReadListener provides callbacks indicating whether characteristics have been read successfully or failed.
      static interface  PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteWriteListener
      PowerMoteWriteListener provides callbacks indicating whether characteristics has been written successfully or failed.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connect to PowerMote.

        This is an asynchronous operation. If connection has been established, the onConnect callback is triggered, otherwise onError callback is triggered.

        Specified by:
        connect in interface BaseDeviceConnection

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects an established connection, or cancels a connection that currently is in progress.

        This is an asynchronous operation. Once disconnection is completed, the onDisconnect callback is triggered.

        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface BaseDeviceConnection

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns whether there is an open connection.
        Specified by:
        isConnected in interface BaseDeviceConnection
        Returns:
        True, if connection is successfully established.

      • getCharacteristics

        public List<BluetoothGattCharacteristic> getCharacteristics()
        Returns a list of GATT characteristics.

        This function requires that connection has been established.

        Specified by:
        getCharacteristics in interface BaseDeviceConnection
        Returns:
        List of characteristics on the remote device.

      • read

        public void read(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
        BaseDeviceConnection.ReadListener readListener)
        Reads the requested characteristic from the remote device.

        This is an asynchronous operation. The successful result of the read operation is returned by the onSuccess callback. If error occurred, the onError callback is triggered.

        Specified by:
        read in interface BaseDeviceConnection
        Parameters:
        characteristic - Characteristic to read from the remote device
        readListener - The read listener
        See Also:
        BluetoothGattCharacteristic, ReadListener

      • writeTxPowerLevel

        public void writeTxPowerLevel(int txPowerLevel,
                     PowerMoteConnection.PowerMoteWriteListener writeListener)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Write TX power level. The Power level is described by 8 levels where 0 is the lowest and 7 is the highest.

        This is an asynchronous operation. Once the write operation has been completed successfully, the onSuccess callback is invoked, otherwise onError callback is triggered.

        Parameters:
        txPowerLevel - New TX power level
        writeListener - Write listener
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - then txPowerLevel out of range [0...7]
        See Also:
        PowerMoteWriteListener
